file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-21-04-02 - FAN WHEEL FORWARD RETAINER - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FAN WHEEL FORWARD RETAINER - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to replace the engine fan wheel forward retainer. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FAN WHEEL FORWARD RETAINER - RE- ALL 72-21-04-960-801-A PLACEMENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-21-04 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-21-04-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FAN WHEEL FORWARD RETAINER - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH Engine 425 RH Engine C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine fan assembly 1 available E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 2 Do the task Engine fan wheel H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THE ENGINE CONTROL MASTER SWITCH IS IN THE “OFF” POSITION TO PREVENT AN ACCIDENTAL ENGINE OPERATION. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – POWERPLANT START 1/2. (2) Put the Workstand next to the air intake. I. Replace/Discard Fan Wheel Forward Retainer SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the forward retainer. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 72-21-04 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Discard the old forward retainer. (3) Install a new forward retainer. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – POWERPLANT START 1/2. (2) Remove the Workstand. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 72-21-04 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
